descriptions: No attempt to identify morphological elements in any language.
Attempts to identify morphological elements are inaccurate and demonstrate no understanding of morphology.
Identifies a few morphological elements in one language with limited accuracy.
Identifies basic morphological elements in one or two languages with some accuracy.
Identifies most morphological elements accurately in two or more languages.
Accurately identifies and explains a wide range of morphological elements in multiple languages.
No attempt to recognize syntactic structures in any language.
Attempts to recognize syntactic structures are inaccurate and show no understanding of syntax.
Recognizes a few basic syntactic structures in one language with limited accuracy.
Recognizes basic syntactic structures in one or two languages with some accuracy.
Recognizes most common syntactic structures accurately in two or more languages.
Accurately recognizes and explains a wide range of syntactic structures in multiple languages.
No comparison of similarities is made.
Attempts to compare similarities are vague and inaccurate.
Identifies superficial similarities between languages.
Identifies some basic similarities between languages with limited explanation.
Clearly identifies and explains significant similarities between languages.
Provides insightful and comprehensive analysis of similarities between languages with supporting evidence.
No comparison of differences is made.
Attempts to compare differences are vague and inaccurate.
Identifies superficial differences between languages.
Identifies some basic differences between languages with limited explanation.
Clearly identifies and explains significant differences between languages.
Provides insightful and comprehensive analysis of differences between languages with supporting evidence.
No linguistic terminology is used.
Incorrect or inappropriate use of linguistic terminology.
Limited and sometimes inaccurate use of linguistic terminology.
Uses basic linguistic terminology correctly.
Uses a range of linguistic terminology accurately and appropriately.
Demonstrates mastery of linguistic terminology with precise and nuanced application.
